feed.title: La Vérendrye (Réserve faunique) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING, La Vérendrye (Réserve faunique)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:58 p.m. EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 3.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Val-d'Or Regional Airport 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 3.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 8 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 3.8°C
Wind: NE 19 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind south 20 km/h. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High 8. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
